name: Orbit: Satellite Defense
description: Protect your planet from alien invaders in this unique RTS experience. Freely reposition Satellites and manually dictate their targets. Manage your Energy reserves to send Satellites into orbit or unleash Planetary Powers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 3, Vista, 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core 2 Duo (TM) 2.0 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Mobile Intel(R) 965 Express Chipset Family DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel(R) i7 Core (TM) 2.3 GHz Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 MB available space
